name: website-schedler-co
description: Curriculum vitae (CV) | Alexander Schedler: Internet application engineering, development and management.

scripts.dev: npm run build:pages; npm run start
scripts.build: npm run clean:build; npm run build:rev -- ./src/version.json; npm run build:pages; parcel build src/index.html --no-cache
scripts.build:copy: cp dist/index.html dist/200.html; cp src/cv-alexander-schedler-en-2022-03-14.pdf dist/cv-alexander-schedler-en-2022-03-14.pdf; cp src/google7f311b514ca2b68b.html dist/google7f311b514ca2b68b.html;
scripts.surge: npm run build; npm run build:copy; surge --domain schedler-co-7.surge.sh dist/
